snippet: A young man in SoHo recalls how he lost a tug of war with a robber over a doorknob, and therein won the battle.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes clever way in which a resident of SoHo, about to become the victim of a push-in robbery at his apartment building, thwarted the intruder, who was soon caught and arrested.
lead_paragraph: A young man in SoHo recalls how he lost a tug of war with a robber over a doorknob, and therein won the battle.

headline.seo: To Thwart Powerful Intruder, He Let Him Open the Door
headline.main: To Thwart a Powerful Intruder, He Let Him Open the Door
headline.print_headline: To Thwart a Powerful Intruder, He Let Him Open the Door
